description: An international alliance of more than 160 countries and the WHO hopes to equitably distribute vaccines and prevent wealthy nations from hoarding the supply, though talks are ongoing to get the U.S. to join.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: U.S. Marshals speak out on Portland clashes between protesters and federal agents
description: Donald Washington and Russel Burger, both U.S. Marshals charged with protecting federal courthouses, tell NBC News’ Erin McLaughlin that protesters targeted their deputies. Agents’ tactics have been criticized, and they pledge to thoroughly investigate cases …

author: NBCNews.com
title: New details in Ghislaine Maxwell case, Jeffrey Epstein’s alleged accomplice
description: In newly released court documents, Virginia Roberts Giuffre alleges who she saw on Epstein’s private island in the Caribbean.
source.name: NBC News

title: 3 suspects charged in Twitter hacking attack

author: NBCNews.com
title: One Marine dead, eight missing in training accident
description: U.S. Navy teams are desperately searching for eight service members who disappeared off the California coast after their Amphibious Assault Vehicle sank during a routine training accident.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Florida braces for Hurricane Isaias while battling coronavirus pandemic
description: A hurricane warning is in place in parts of Florida as residents prepare for Isaias’ impact. Preparations for the storm are especially difficult as the state battles the coronavirus pandemic and test sites are forced to shut down.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Trump renews attacks on mail-in voting despite no evidence it leads to fraud
description: After suggesting the November election potentially be postponed, President Trump is once more questioning the legitimacy of mail-in voting, but would not say what he is doing to help protect the integrity of the election.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: New coronavirus spikes driven by gatherings of young people, authorities say
description: Gatherings of young people are behind new spikes in coronavirus cases, authorities say, adding to concerns about how colleges will handle outbreaks on campus as they reopen.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: CDC: U.S. coronavirus death toll could reach 180,000 by end of August
description: During a tense Congressional hearing on Friday, Dr. Anthony Fauci said he feels “cautiously optimistic” that a coronavirus vaccine could be ready by the end of the year or early 2021.
source.name: NBC News

author: Janelle Griffith
title: An 8-year-old girl was attacked by a fox. A neighbor used a basketball to help her.
description: An 8-year-old New Jersey girl is recovering after she was attacked by a fox blocks from her home. A young man threw a basketball at the fox to distract it then chased the animal away.

title: Homework-skipping teen to be released

title: Viral video creator explains why he took a Black Lives Matter sign to Arkansas
description: A man's video of reactions he got while holding a Black Lives Matter sign in a town identified as one of the "most racist" in America is gaining national attention. WOOD's Whitney Burney reports.
